com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class AbstractItemReadStore<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.AbstractItemReadStore<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemReadStore<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractItemStore, ItemCache

    public abstract class AbstractItemReadStore<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemReadStore<T>
    An abstract class representing a thing that reads items from somewhere. This is intended to be non-ZK-specific, although whether it would really apply to other storage mediums remains to be seen.
